entries.quest_destroy_d: Destroy Blacksun Bloodstalkers or Blacksun Hunters.
entries.quest_location_d: 'The planet of Ord Mantell has a temperate climate with a vareity of different terrain types. The most remarkable are the plateaus peppering Ord Mantell's surface. Be sure to visit the Ten Mile Plateau while on Ord Mantell!'
entries.split_quest_alert: Aleas Rans'ery: <Pilot! Now's not the time fer revenge! Ya disobeyed a direct order! [Static.. *tzzzt!*] Pilot! Blacksun are comin' straight for ya!>
entries.title: Vendetta: The Counter-Attack
entries.title_d: 'It's time to make a stand against these villains! Aleas acts too slowly for my liking and my skill at flying surpasses most! I can't just stand by and do small tasks when there's a war out there! For the Car'das and freedom!'
